import {React,Fragment} from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export default function ProductItem(props) { const product = props.product; const CartItems = useSelector(state => state.CartItemsReducer.CartItems); const dispatch =dispatch const RemoveItem = () =>{ } return (

  • {product.product.title}

    ${product.product.price}

    {product.product.category}

    Qty {product.qty}
